issue.title: Implement Quarkus based HTTP protocol adapter
issue.body: This is part of #2103 work to migrate Hono from Spring boot to Quarkus.

issue.title: Migrate Sigfox adapter to Quarkus
issue.body:
The Sigfox adapter is still experimental. We therefore can simply migrate the existing code to use Quarkus instead of Spring Boot.

This is part of #2103
